description: Returns a list of all historical purchases, renewals, and system renewal transactions for an AWS account. The list is paginated and ordered by a descending timestamp (most recent transactions are first). The API returns a NotEligible error if the user is not permitted to invoke the operation. If you must be able to invoke this operation, contact aws-devicefarm-support@amazon.com.

nested_items.name: offeringTransactions
nested_items.description: The audit log of subscriptions you have purchased and modified through AWS Device Farm.

nested_items.name: offeringStatus
nested_items.description: The status of an offering transaction.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type specified for the offering status.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID that corresponds to a device offering.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A string that describes the offering.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of offering (for example, RECURRING) for a device.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The platform of the device (for example, ANDROID or IOS).

nested_items.name: recurringCharges
nested_items.description: Specifies whether there are recurring charges for the offering.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numerical amount of an offering or transaction.

nested_items.name: currencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code of a monetary amount. For example, USD means U.S. dollars.

nested_items.name: frequency
nested_items.description: The frequency in which charges recur.

nested_items.name: quantity
nested_items.description: The number of available devices in the offering.

nested_items.name: effectiveOn
nested_items.description: The date on which the offering is effective.

nested_items.name: transactionId
nested_items.description: The transaction ID of the offering transaction.

nested_items.name: offeringPromotionId
nested_items.description: The ID that corresponds to a device offering promotion.

nested_items.name: createdOn
nested_items.description: The date on which an offering transaction was created.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numerical amount of an offering or transaction.

nested_items.name: currencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code of a monetary amount. For example, USD means U.S. dollars.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: An identifier that was returned from the previous call to this operation, which can be used to return the next set of items in the list.
